name: Dropsuite Ltd
description: Provider of a cloud-based software platform designed to help businesses to backup, recover and protect their important business information. The company's cloud-based software platform offer services that include website and database backup, email backup and email archiving, enabling small and medium enterprises to restore and backup all their important data in a secured cloud storage.
one_liner: Provider of a cloud-based software platform designed to help businesses to backup, recover and protect their important business information. The company's cloud-based software platform offer services that include website and database backup, email backup and email archiving, enabling small and medium enterprises to restore and backup all their important data in a secured cloud storage.
